attributes.title: This app promotes Fake News!
attributes.review: Countless lies, never checking the facts. Calling valid things ‘hoax’. Doesn’t trust scientists and doctors. Clearly promoting racism and white supremacy. This app has so many glitches, it doesn’t have anything in coherent sentences or proper English, its almost like its having a stroke. The app hasn’t proved its paid its taxes and has given its brother and sister apps tax breaks. The apps company has also put children in cages, lost 3,000 of those children, and caused 132,298 deaths & counting. The company of this app is just trash, the app is trash. The company cares more about itself and money then it does about its users. The app promotes a Nazi symbol. I honestly believe this apps ceo has a mental health condition called NPD, as they are a bully and throw tantrums like a child. Overall the app is just complete garbage and I honestly don’t understand how it’s even existed this long on the App Store, I don’t think it won the people’s choice but was just paid for by another app to be here. I think the App Store might have been hacked in order to have this app here. This app is also letting the app who forged its way onto the App Store take out its own security team. This app also doesn’t take care of the other apps it owns, and even forgets it owns those other apps. This app is guilty of so many horrible, disgusting, should be in prison, things that I can’t even list them all. Just know that this app is awful and if you download it to your phone it could potentially give your phone a virus and cause you to become hateful and mentally unwell.
